classmeta.shortdesc: Container for arranging a group of buttons vertically.

desc.simpara: GtkVButtonBox is a container widget designed for arranging a column of buttons in accordance with a specified GtkButtonBoxStyle setting.

constructor.shortdesc: Creates the basis for a vertical button container.

desc.simpara: As with all container widgets, no physical space is taken by a GtkVButtonBox until its child widgets are in place.
